verbs.description: [ARG0: This community] [V: voted] [ARGM-MNR: overwhelmingly] [ARG1: for Donald Trump] . But now his immigration restrictions are killing their livelihood — legendary crabs that are a staple of the local economy and a delicious treat around the county .
